resources.string: Answer the following questions with integer numbers!
1. What digit is most frequent between 0 and 1,000?
2. What digit is least frequent between 0 and 1,000?
3. In a certain country 1/2 of 5 = 3. If the same proportion holds, what is the value of 1/3 of 10 ?
4. There are several books on a bookshelf. If one book is the 4th from the left and 6th from the right, how many books are on the shelf?
6. If today was Thursday, what day would it be after 1,000 days?
7. \"If yesterday were tomorrow, today would be Saturday.\" Which day did I say this?
8. \'A\' has a speed of 18km/h and \'B\' has a speed of 16km/h. They raced on a track and \'A\' finished the race 10 minutes before \'B\'. What is the length of the track?
9. When Amy was 4 years old her brother was double her age. What\'s the age of Amy\'s brother when she becomes 50 years old?
10. A shelf contains 8 books: 4 Roman, 3 Series, 1 Scientific. We take simultaneously 3 books. What\'s the probability of taking 2 Roman books and 1 Series book?
